title: IGNOU Extends Re-Registration Deadline for January 2026 Session Till 31 January
description: IGNOU has extended the re-registration deadline for all ODL and Online programmes for the January 2026 session till 31 January 2026.

title: IGNOU Puts Psychology Programmes on Hold for January 2026 Admission
description: IGNOU has officially put MA Psychology, BA Psychology and PG Diploma in Mental Health on hold for the January 2026 admission cycle.

title: President Murmu Inaugurates IGNOU Regional Skill Centre in Odisha
description: President Droupadi Murmu inaugurated a new IGNOU Regional Skill Centre in Odisha to promote skill-based education.

title: IGNOU Launches New Skill Courses 2026
description: IGNOU announced new job-oriented skill courses for the 2026 admission cycle.

title: IGNOU Job Fair 2026: Big Opportunity for IGNOU Students
description: IGNOU announced Job Fair / Placement Drive 2026 for UG & PG students.
